siteMetadata.title: A Dictionary of Unconventional Matter
siteMetadata.description:
A compilation of stories, guides, shortcuts, broken realities,
      inexact histories, fears and worries, true names of things, snakes, ladders, partridges, slang,
      euphemisms, grammars, cold weather, and outdated encyclopedias.
siteMetadata.author: @samsav
